page.title: 12ECOLOGY
page.content: As the largest proportion of the block is arable land, ecology takes on an important role in the life of the countryside. The main crops are cereals so the farmers feel that they must spray with insecticides to protect their crops from pests. Unfortunately along with the pests other valuable creatures such as bees are also destroyed. Birds also suffer when they eat contaminated insects and our hedgerows and roadside verges are depleted of wildlife. Fish and other aquatic life suffer when the water becomes polluted through drainage from the fields. Some farmers are now realising the extent of the problem and trying to improve matters.
